lead_paragraph: The Boston University center that studies brain injuries to professional athletes says it will release its findings on the former N.F.L. player Dave Duerson on Monday.
snippet: The Boston University center that studies brain injuries to professional athletes says it will release its findings on the former N.F.L. player Dave Duerson on Monday.
